top_categories.workout_context: Silver City Century rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
At 100 miles, Silver City Century punishes athletes who haven’t trained their body to produce power when glycogen runs low.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Silver City Century. Make this intensity feel like home.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Silver City Century when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Silver City Century’s iowa rolling, local event demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Every session at Silver City Century intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
At 100 miles, Silver City Century rewards a massive aerobic engine. This volume work builds the fat-oxidation capacity that keeps you moving when glycogen runs low.
Racing Silver City Century isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Silver City Century — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Tempo is the race-day intensity of Silver City Century. Harder than Z2, easier than threshold — the pace you’ll hold for hours on iowa rolling gravel.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Silver City Century’s iowa rolling gravel delivers on race day.
The varied gradients at Silver City Century reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Silver City Century’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Silver City Century requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on iowa rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: iowa rolling, local event, midwest gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Durability, and G Spot to prepare you for 100 miles of iowa rolling gravel in Silver City, Iowa.
